ygData.subject: RE: Suggestions?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmmm... claws aren t your style and axes aren t your style. Hmmmm.... with that in mind, here are my suggestions. Brazen Brass Kilij Ashenwood Short Spear
ygData.messageBody:
Hmmm... claws aren't your style and axes aren't your style. Hmmmm.... with
that in mind, here are my suggestions.

Brazen Brass Kilij
Ashenwood Short Spear
Dragoon Dirk
Staff of Writhing
Crystalline Blade
Enamelled Mace

Any others?

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 30 Bard (Povar) - who is currently using a Silvery War Axe and Bladed
Claws :)


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:Dean_Kimes@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, October 12, 1999 3:24 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Suggestions?
>
>
> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
> Hmmm, is that what these funny looking gloves are made of?
> are you sure?
> That's disgusting surely they just call'em that, they aren't
> really made of
> the skin of a sentient being at all, naw just another
> marketing ploy like
> Naugahide right?
>
> I have tried for the belt and been laughed off the auction
> channel. I'm not
> sure why but there were multiple laughers so I backed off. I
> did almost get
> a thick banded belt bizarrely from one of the guys who said I
> didn't have a
> chance in Guk of seeing a troll hide belt. Bizarre, truly bizarre.
>
> I thought about the claws. Umm, no def not my style. In
> fact, now that I
> think about it, ick. I'd rather use my crappy combine scimmy
> than look like
> some wolvie clone or mr krueger's understudy. Sigh, guess if
> I insist on
> cool and useful I'll just have to wait. I'd settle for cool though.
>
> Kitasi
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 [mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, October 12, 1999 3:21 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: [eqbards] Suggestions?
>
>
> From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
> Since you are hanging out in Guk, try to get your hands on
> the dark elf hide
> gloves and the troll-hide belt. They are bard/rogue only so
> the demand
> isn't as
> high for them. Those two will give you ten more points to
> your STR. After
> I
> got those two items I was able to start wearing bronze plate
> and still have
> room
> to carry stuff. My base STR is 76 and with items is now 100. Another
> option is
> the Blackened Iron Crown in Runnyeye. I think it also adds
> five points to
> STR
> plus bonuses to resists. For weapons, thulian claws seem to
> be the bard
> weapon
> of choice for those in their 20s and will cost around 400PP.
>
> Galtin of E'ci
>
>
> > Message: 20
> > Date: Tue, 12 Oct 1999 10:24:36 -0600
> > From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
> > Subject: Suggestions?
> >
> > Hail all!
> > After my latest adventure grouping with our guilds new
> wizard in cleri'c
> > clothing I decided to foray off and try my hand at soloing
> once more. I
> > have journeyed to far off Upper Guk where I have been
> taking on the Heart
> > Spiders found there. The experience has thus far been most
> fruitful both
> in
> > terms of silks and xp. While I died 4 times the first
> nite, my ping was
> at
> > an all time record low (for me) and I was able to make it
> back to my body
> in
> > 27 minutes! I have found my experience bar moving steadily
> upward and
> > expect to make 18th level tonite.
> >
> > My question is this? What sort of equipment should I start
> looking for at
> > my level to help improve my performance. A lot of the
> equipment I have
> now
> > is already better than I could get on my own as my trade skills have
> > actually been profitable! Sssshhh... don't tell Verant.
> I'm thinking
> what
> > I need most is a primary weapon upgrade, I am currently alternating
> between
> > a Dragoon Dirk and a Screaming Mace as primary. I have
> about 250pp, but
> can
> > easily make another 100-200 by selling cured silk this
> week. I welcome
> any
> > suggestions that don't require me to carry a stupid axe ;)
> >
> > I think my armor is as good as it will be for a while,
> except maybe for my
> > helm. I have Barbed Arms and legs, Crush tunic,
> Bloodstained Mantle,
> > Bearskin Boots, a sleek black cape, Leatherfoot Raider's
> helm, 2 jagged
> > bands, bracer of erolissi, silver-plated bracer, purity
> belt (still?),
> > electrum pearl necklace (upgrade to gold?). I use a chitin
> shell shield
> or
> > dual wield depending on the situation. Any ideas what
> armor upgrades I
> > could get without bumping my weight up too much? I'm a
> natural weakling
> > (Str73) so have concentrated on stat boosting armor.
> >
> > Thanks for the input!
> >
> > Kitasi
> > somewhere in Guk looking for a 'real' cleric
> >
> >
> >
>

> the subject lol.
